isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 5000, 9000 Series Without Lowered heater Box - MAINTENANCE - SIGHT GLASS CHECK OF THE SYSTEM CHARGE (R-12 SYSTEMS ONLY)

svcproc.title: SIGHT GLASS CHECK OF THE SYSTEM CHARGE (R-12 SYSTEMS ONLY)

note.para: The sight glass is not a reliable method of checking system charge on R-134a systems. The following procedures are provided for R-12 systems only.

step1.para: Start engine and operate A/C system.

Observe the sight glass in the receiver-dehydrator for bubbles ( Figure 10). The sight glass should appear clear. If not, see GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the Master Service Manual, for the vehicle being serviced.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. SIGHT GLASS CLEAR - SYSTEM FULL (R-12 SYSTEMS ONLY)
2. SIGHT GLASS BUBBLES - SYSTEM NEEDS CHARGE (R-12 SYSTEMS ONLY)
